title: New to The Club, Meets in Home / Eastern Counties?

posts.content:
Hi All,

I (very recently) bought my first splitty, from a member of this site, and can't wait to get it out and about. It's a 66 Kombi, rolling resto (hopefully more rolling, less resto).

Are there any upcoming meets in London / home counties, or eastern counties? would love to come along and get involved in the local scene.

Thanks

Welcome to the club, I'm not from down that way but there are plenty of members in the area.

Get your account linked and get access to the Members Area, details of discounts and Members events are in there.

https://www.ssvc.org.uk/phpbb/viewtopic ... 2&t=108144

There's a list of upcoming events on the main page:-

https://ssvc.org.uk/

The next one is the Technical Weekend in Leicestershire, 31st August.
